messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Barry Thomas" <warlord@...> wrote:
>
> It was
> http://www.shaolin-society.co.uk/shaolin_legacy/history.php?history=13
> but PUHLEEZE note that the material there was a direct steal from
the samurai-archives.com website (from Oda Nobunaga downwards)

No, actually the ENTIRE PAGE from top to bottom is stolen from the
Samurai-archives. I have sent emails, we will see how far they wish
me to take this.

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] What website?
messages.msgSnippet: It was http://www.shaolin-society.co.uk/shaolin_legacy/history.php?history=13 but PUHLEEZE note that the material there was a direct steal from the
messages.messageBody:
It was
http://www.shaolin-society.co.uk/shaolin_legacy/history.php?history=13
but PUHLEEZE note that the material there was a direct steal from the samurai-archives.com website (from Oda Nobunaga downwards):
http://www.samurai-archives.com/

I would appreciate people doing a little research of their own with google before appealing to the list...

Regards,
Barry Thomas
PS: and signing off politely...

----- Original Message -----
From: johann_hollar
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, March 25, 2008 5:43 AM
Subject: [samuraihistory] What website?


Hey what was that one website? You know that shaolin.com thing? I
would appreciate a reply.
.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
